[Flame nāga sorcerer](/flameNagaSorcerer/) loot
[Vessali's Head](/vessalisHead/) (upon death) |neck = Orishia |internalname = CHA_CRE_Naga_Shaman_Bounty |guid = 22a90e32-3753-42c5-a078-075f75217e42 }} '''Flamewalker Vessali''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background One of the local nāga tribes put out a bounty on Flamewalker Vessali, a flame nāga shaman who betrayed and murdered one of her own, drawing a rival leader into an ambush under the guise of truce. She was last seen slithering around the eastern parts of the Kua o Rikuhu island chain, occupying her latest conquest. Nungata will pay a good price for her head. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali](/bountyFlamewalkerVessali/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali](/bountyFlamewalkerVessali/): Vessali is the target of the bounty.

[[Vessali's Head]] (upon death) |neck = Orishia |internalname = CHA_CRE_Naga_Shaman_Bounty |guid = 22a90e32-3753-42c5-a078-075f75217e42 }} '''Flamewalker Vessali''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== One of the local nāga tribes put out a bounty on Flamewalker Vessali, a flame nāga shaman who betrayed and murdered one of her own, drawing a rival leader into an ambush under the guise of truce. She was last seen slithering around the eastern parts of the Kua o Rikuhu island chain, occupying her latest conquest. Nungata will pay a good price for her head. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali]]: Vessali is the target of the bounty.
